## Linear Regression using R

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| echo: true

library(tidyverse)

iris_setosa <- iris %>% 
  filter(Species == "setosa")
head(iris_setosa)
ggplot(data = iris_setosa, mapping = aes(x = Sepal.Width, y = Sepal.Length)) +
  geom_point() + 
  stat_smooth(method = "lm")
  

model <- lm(data = iris_setosa,formula = "Sepal.Length ~ 1 + Sepal.Width")

summary(model)



```
